Introduction
This topic contains information about the process for handling notice of a child’s intent to begin or continue school attendance at a future date, including
payment of benefits based on school attendance in the future or when a child turns 18
, and
confirming a child began or continued attending school
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Awards and Adjustments Based Upon School Attendance
citation: Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
